game_description: Missing cricket and wanting to be back at the crease? Cover Drive Cricket puts you at the heart of the action! Set huge scores batting first, or prove you can handle the pressure chasing down a target. Test your skills against a Challenge, and try to survive against a wide variety of different bowlers. "a no brainer for cricket lovers" "I LOVE THIS GAME!" Come say hi! https://discord.gg/rFUzN6xbmQ Includes: - 10, 20 and 50-over games against AI opponents, - Super Over, Survival and Target challenges (plus Spin-only challenges!) - Unlimited Practice, - 16 bowling styles and 4 difficulty levels, - Track your stats to see where every delivery hit the bat, where your shots go and how you can improve against each type of bowler, - Play against your friends with real-time chat in PvP multiplayer, - Left- or right-handed batting, with vibration feedback, - Play with your real bat, - Leaderboards, - Achievements, - Replay mode - replay every delivery to see how you can improve - Fireworks!
review_1: I had been going through quite a rough spot in the last few games and then i played this again and i managed to rediscover my old form and i have hd an average of 163 in the last 4 games after i had tried it. I know its just a game, but it can really help aswell, would definitely recommend.
review_2: Just a great cricket sim. Really good tracking of the bat and some of the best physics I've seen/felt in VR.
review_3: Update has bugs. It just freezes in the middle of the game and one has to start over. It's a paid game and a big disappointment that has started after the updates. It was amazing and worked flawlessly before that. Developers needs to focus on fixing the crashes.
review_4: Hi, I have been playing this game for a while now and was really enjoying it. I too a few weeks break and came back to a new update and it has literally broke the game. The bounce for the spinners in unrealistic and middling the ball is almost impossible. The difficulty level is through the roof compared to last patch and the game just isn't fun anymore. Thai should have been a 1 start review, but I am giving 3 starts because I originally did love the game and issue is only with the current patch
review_5: The app is frequently getting banged in the middle. Too many glitches
